verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shoshannim. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. Maschil. A Song of loves. My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7370>overfloweth<s%> with a <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%>; I <S%H559>speak<s%> the things which I have <S%H4639>made<s%> touching the <S%H4428>king<s%>: My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is the <S%H5842>pen<s%> of a <S%H4106>ready<s%> <S%H5608>writer<s%>.

Thou art <S%H3302>fairer<s%> than the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>; <S%H2580>Grace<s%> is <S%H3332>poured<s%> into thy <S%H8193>lips<s%>: Therefore <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Gird <S%H2296><s%> thy <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, O <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1935>one<s%>, Thy glory and thy <S%H1926>majesty<s%>.

And in thy <S%H1926>majesty<s%> <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6743>prosperously<s%>, <S%H1697>Because<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H6037>meekness<s%> and <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: And thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee terrible <S%H3372>things<s%>.
Thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp<s%>; The <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> under <S%H3820>thee<s%>; They are in the heart of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
Thy <S%H3678>throne<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, is for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>: A <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of <S%H4334>equity<s%> is the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>: Therefore <S%H430>God<s%>, thy <S%H430>God<s%>, hath <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee With the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>gladness<s%> above thy <S%H2270>fellows<s%>.

All thy <S%H899>garments<s%> smell of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, and <S%H174>aloes<s%>, and <S%H7102>cassia<s%>; Out of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1964>palaces<s%> <S%H4482>stringed<s%> instruments have made thee <S%H8055>glad<s%>.

Kings <S%H4428><s%>' <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are among thy honorable <S%H3368>women<s%>: At thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> doth <S%H5324>stand<s%> the <S%H7694>queen<s%> in <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir<s%>.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H7200>consider<s%>, and <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%>; <S%H7911>Forget<s%> also thine own <S%H5971>people<s%>, and thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>:
So will the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H183>desire<s%> thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%>; For he is thy <S%H113>lord<s%>; And reverence thou <S%H7812>him<s%>.
And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> shall be there with a <S%H4503>gift<s%>; The <S%H6223>rich<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H2470>entreat<s%> thy <S%H6440>favor<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> the palace is all <S%H3520>glorious<s%>: Her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is <S%H4865>inwrought<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

She shall be <S%H2986>led<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> in broidered <S%H7553>work<s%>: The <S%H1330>virgins<s%> her <S%H7464>companions<s%> that <S%H310>follow<s%> her Shall be brought unto <S%H935>thee<s%>.
With <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>rejoicing<s%> shall they be <S%H2986>led<s%>: They shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1964>palace<s%>.
Instead of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall be thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, Whom thou shalt <S%H7896>make<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

I will make thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>: Therefore shall the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
